0.title: Winter Average Precipitation
0.subTitle: [stationName]
0.caption: Average annual winter (December to February) precipitation. The lowest (min) and highest (max) precipitation of the month. Note the measurement of snow from precipitation is estimated from precipitation taking place when the temperature was simultaneously recorded as below 0 C. These values should be considered estimates and not a precise value.

1.title: Winter Average Precipitation Difference From Baseline
1.subTitle: [stationName]
1.caption: Difference between the winter (December-February) seasonal averages and the average for the baseline period, [baseline].
